text: "If You Don't Wanna Love Me" is a song recorded by American R&B; singer Tamar Braxton (then credited as Tamar), issued as the second single from her eponymous debut album. It was her first song to appear on the Billboard Hot 100, peaking at #89 in 2000. ==Music video== The official music video for the song was directed by Diane Martel. ==Track listings and formats== ==Chart positions== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2000) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Hot 100 |align=center|89 |- |US Dance Music/Club Play Singles (Billboard) |align=center|34 |- |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks (Billboard) |align=center|30 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1999 songs Category:2000 singles Category:DreamWorks Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Diane Martel Category:Song recordings produced by Tricky Stewart Category:Songs written by LaTocha Scott Category:Songs written by Tricky Stewart Category:Tamar Braxton songs
title: If You Don't Wanna Love Me
